DatasetFactory¶

class shabda.data.DatasetFactory[source]¶

Bases: object

Factory class to import the datasets dynamically. This is used in conjuction with experiments, where dataset can be plugged in with the change of the filename

static get(dataset_file_name)[source]¶

Returns the class handle for the given file name :param dataset_file_name: :return: class handle

AudioDatasetBase¶

class shabda.data.AudioDatasetBase(hparams, unknown_label='_unknown_')[source]¶

Bases: object

Interface class for Audio Datasets.

Any audio dataset is expected to inherit this class and give implementation. AudioDataset expectations are: - Provide list of training, validation and test files files - Expose list of lables and predefined labels, which then can be used for label indexing

static default_hparams()[source]¶

Exposes the default params for this module :return: dict: params

get_dataset_name()[source]¶

Inheriting class must take care of implementing this method :return: Name of the dataset

get_index_2_label(index)[source]¶

Returns the label string, considering the predefined labels :param index: int :return: label: string

get_label_2_index(label)[source]¶

Returns the index of the label, considering the predefined labels :param label: string :return: index: int

get_labels()[source]¶

Inheriting class must take care of implementing this method :return: List of lables for the dataset under consideration

get_labels_dim()[source]¶

Returns the total number of labels in this dataset along with any deafault lables like silent, back_ground_noise, if any. :return: int

get_num_train_samples()[source]¶

Inheriting class must take care of implementing this method :return: int Number of training sample for current dataset

get_one_hot_encoded(label)[source]¶

Returns the one-hot encoded array of the label :param label: string :return: np.array

get_predefined_labels()[source]¶

Inheriting class must take care of implementing this method :return: list of predefined lables. Eg: [“_silence_”, “_background_noise_”]

get_test_files()[source]¶

Inheriting class must take care of implementing this method :return: list of test files

get_test_labels()[source]¶

Inheriting class must take care of implementing this method :return: list of labels in sync with test files

get_train_files()[source]¶

Inheriting class must take care of implementing this method :return: list of files for training

get_train_labels()[source]¶

Inheriting class must take care of implementing this method :return: list of labels in sync with training files

get_val_files()[source]¶

Inheriting class must take care of implementing this method :return: list of validation files

get_val_labels()[source]¶

Inheriting class must take care of implementing this method :return: list of labels in sync with validation files

init()[source]¶

Inheriting class must take care of implementing this method Should call self._setup_labels() along with other initializations :return: None

load_labels_index_map(file_path)[source]¶

Reads the JSON file from the path and loads them into dataset label indexer :param file_path: File path of the JSON :return: None

store_labels_index_map(file_name='labels_index_map.json')[source]¶

Stores teh current label index as json, as per the path labels_index_map_store_path specified in the params Full store path: labels_index_map_store_path/dataset_name/ :return: None
